about_the_game:
Welcome to the Wasteland of Tomorrow!

The world as you knew it? Long gone—like a cassette tape that’s been chewed up by a faulty player. In its place lies a vibrant, chaotic civilization where the remnants of life scrape by amid bizarre mutants, jittery robots, and terrible monsters that would give your worst nightmares a run for their money.

In this colorful post-apocalyptic playground, you’ll need to assemble a ragtag team of fellow fortune seekers. Scavenge the wreckage of the old world for quirky artifacts, powerful weapons, and maybe even a dog treat or two—because every hero deserves a snack!

  • Focused on a team of characters, you build your team during each run (just like your deck), a chosen ally will bring their own pool of cards into the game as well as their own unique abilities.

  • Dynamic movement and enemy intent system that requires players to juggle incoming damage and positioning their characters to avoid it.

  • Procedural mission system. Each 2-4 event adventure features unique combinations of enemies, modifiers, and rewards. Choose your challenge level and face the consequences.

  • Unlock powerful upgrades through gameplay alone: Expand your collection with booster packs, deck upgrades, artifacts, and consumables - no microtransactions, ever.

After each mission through the forbidden zones, spend your hard-earned floppy disks (the currency used in the new world) to snag booster packs, heal or replace fallen teammates, or upgrade your deck with powerful sigils.

Sharpen your skills against the bizarre and dangerous creatures lurking in radioactive zones, where treasures await those brave enough to seek them. Claim your loot and build a deck of cards that’ll take you further than anyone has dared to go. Unearth the mysteries of what happened to civilization and carve a path to your ultimate destiny.

The future may be bleak, but your adventure is just beginning!

Wishlist the game now to get notified when the demo is released and join us on Discord to get early demo access and become a part of the game development journey!

short_description: Love deck building? Experience a new take in this rogue-lite, set in a wacky post-apocalyptic world! In each run, build your team of mutants, robots, and survivors, with unique cards and powers. Choose missions wisely trading off risk against rewards used to upgrade your deck with booster packs.
